text.more: Social Network of Iisalmi parish District Court 1639-1651. Nodes are persons appearing in District Court sessions (Fi: käräjät, Swe: ting). Edges represent relationship between persons that appear in same Court Case. Most of the persons with highest "Betweeness Centrality" and "Degree" are the lay members of the court (Fi: lautamiehet, Swe: Nämndemän).
